channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-28608] TestReplicationMigrationTool test cases are not running
item.description:
Currently, since we are using Older maven surefire plugin, TestReplicationMigrationTool testcases are failing with below error.

 

Corrupted STDOUT by directly writing to native stream in forked JVM 1. Stream ':maven:surefire:std:out:test-failed:normal-run:UTF-8:b3JnLmFwYWNoZS5oYWRvb3AuaGl2ZS5xbC5wYXJzZS5UZXN0UmVwbGljYXRpb25NaWdyYXRpb25Ub29s::dGVzdEV4dHJhQW5kTWlzc2luZ0ZpbGVzQXRTb3VyY2U=::::::VGVzdFJlcGxpY2F0aW9uTWlncmF0aW9uVG9vbC50ZXN0RXh0cmFBbmRNaXNzaW5nRmlsZXNBdFNvdXJjZToxNTktPnZlcmlmeVN1Y2Nlc3NmdWxSZXN1bHQ6Mzk4:'.
java.lang.NumberFormatException: For input string: "VGVzdFJlcGxpY2F0aW9uTWlncmF0aW9uVG9vbC50ZXN0RXh0cmFBbmRNaXNzaW5nRmlsZXNBdFNvdXJjZToxNTktPnZlcmlmeVN1Y2Nlc3NmdWxSZXN1bHQ6Mzk4"
at java.lang.NumberFormatException.forInputString(NumberFormatException.java:65)
at java.lang.Integer.parseInt(Integer.java:580)
at java.lang.Integer.valueOf(Integer.java:740)
at java.lang.Integer.decode(Integer.java:1197)
at org.apache.maven.plugin.surefire.booterclient.output.ForkedChannelDecoder.decodeToInteger(ForkedChannelDecoder.java:334)
at org.apache.maven.plugin.surefire.booterclient.output.ForkedChannelDecoder.toReportEntry(ForkedChannelDecoder.java:318)
at org.apache.maven.plugin.surefire.booterclient.output.ForkedChannelDecoder.handleEvent(ForkedChannelDecoder.java:273)
at org.apache.maven.plugin.surefire.booterclient.output.ForkClient.processLine(ForkClient.java:409)
at org.apache.maven.plugin.surefire.booterclient.output.ForkClient.consumeLine(ForkClient.java:379)
at org.apache.maven.plugin.surefire.booterclient.output.ThreadedStreamConsumer$Pumper.run(ThreadedStreamConsumer.java:88)
at java.lang.Thread.run(Thread.java:750)

 

 

Post Maven surefire plugin upgrade, HIVE-28519 testcases are failing with Assertion error.
ERROR] Tests run: 4, Failures: 3, Errors: 0, Skipped: 0, Time elapsed: 73.89 s <<< FAILURE! – in org.apache.hadoop.hive.ql.parse.TestReplicationMigrationTool

item.summary: TestReplicationMigrationTool test cases are not running

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: I merged the PR. Thanks Indhumathi27 for submitting the patch!
